enumeration.items: gull_wing j_lead reversed_j_lead integral_terminal undefined ball straight

where.label: WR1
where.expression: derived_zone_shape_class IN [ 'area' , 'edge' ]

derived.name: maximum_package_total_vertical_extent
derived.expression: max_data_element ( add_data_element ( maximum_body_height_above_seating_plane , maximum_body_height_below_seating_plane ) , add_data_element ( maximum_body_height_above_seating_plane , maximum_lead_length_below_seating_plane ) )

where.label: WR1
where.expression: NOT ( SIZEOF ( package_primary_orientation_feature ) > 0 ) OR ( 'PACKAGE_ARM.PRIMARY_ORIENTATION_FEATURE' IN TYPEOF ( package_primary_orientation_feature [ 1 ] ) )

where.label: WR2
where.expression: NOT ( SIZEOF ( package_secondary_orientation_feature ) > 0 ) OR ( 'PACKAGE_ARM.SECONDARY_ORIENTATION_FEATURE' IN TYPEOF ( package_secondary_orientation_feature [ 1 ] ) )

where.label: WR3
where.expression: NOT ( SIZEOF ( package_tertiary_orientation_feature ) > 0 ) OR ( 'PACKAGE_ARM.TERTIARY_ORIENTATION_FEATURE' IN TYPEOF ( package_tertiary_orientation_feature [ 1 ] ) )

where.label: WR4
where.expression: 'PACKAGE_ARM.SEATING_PLANE' IN TYPEOF ( package_seating_plane )

where.label: WR5
where.expression: 'PACKAGE_ARM.SEATING_PLANE' IN TYPEOF ( interface_plane )

where.label: WR6
where.expression: NOT ( mounting_technology = surface_mount ) OR ( NOT ( EXISTS ( maximum_lead_length_below_seating_plane ) OR EXISTS ( least_lead_length_below_seating_plane ) ) )

where.label: WR7
where.expression: NOT ( EXISTS ( maximum_lead_length_below_seating_plane ) ) OR ( maximum_lead_length_below_seating_plane \ Value_with_unit . value_component > 0.0 )

where.label: WR8
where.expression: NOT ( EXISTS ( least_lead_length_below_seating_plane ) ) OR ( least_lead_length_below_seating_plane \ Value_with_unit . value_component > 0.0 )

where.label: WR9
where.expression: ( NOT ( mounting_technology = surface_mount ) AND NOT ( EXISTS ( surface_mount_lead_form ) ) ) OR ( ( mounting_technology = surface_mount ) AND ( EXISTS ( surface_mount_lead_form ) ) )

where.label: WR10
where.expression: package_seating_plane \ Shape_element . element_name = 'package seating plane'

where.label: WR11
where.expression: NOT ( SIZEOF ( interface_plane ) > 0 ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ip <* interface_plane | NOT ( ip \ Shape_element . element_name = 'interface plane' ) ) ) = 0 )

where.label: WR12
where.expression: NOT ( SIZEOF ( interface_plane ) > 0 ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ip <* interface_plane | NOT ( package_seating_plane <> ip ) ) ) = 0 )

where.label: WR13
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( prpc <* USEDIN ( SELF \ Product_view_definition . defined_version . of_product , 'PACKAGE_ARM.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_ASSIGNMENT.PRODUCTS' ) | ( prpc . name = 'package' ) ) ) > 0

where.label: WR14
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pa <* package_accesses | 'PACKAGE_ARM.PRIMARY_REFERENCE_TERMINAL' IN TYPEOF ( pa ) ) ) = 1

where.label: WR15
where.expression: ( EXISTS ( surface_mount_lead_form ) ) XOR ( ( SIZEOF ( external_surface_mount_lead_form ) ) = 1 )

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pf <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'PACKAGE_ARM.PACKAGE_BODY_SURFACE.ASSOCIATED_DEFINITION' ) | ( 'PACKAGE_ARM.' + 'PACKAGE_BODY_TOP_SURFACE' IN TYPEOF ( pf ) ) ) ) <= 1

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pf <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'PACKAGE_ARM.PACKAGE_BODY_SURFACE.ASSOCIATED_DEFINITION' ) | ( 'PACKAGE_ARM.' + 'PACKAGE_BODY_BOTTOM_SURFACE' IN TYPEOF ( pf ) ) ) ) <= 1

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pf <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'PACKAGE_ARM.PACKAGE_BODY_SURFACE.ASSOCIATED_DEFINITION' ) | ( 'PACKAGE_ARM.' + 'PACKAGE_BODY_EDGE_SURFACE' IN TYPEOF ( pf ) ) ) ) <= 1

where.label: WR4
where.expression: 'CONDUCTIVITY_MATERIAL_ASPECTS.' + 'MATERIAL_IDENTIFICATION_WITH_CONDUCTIVITY_CLASSIFICATION' IN TYPEOF ( body_material )

where.label: WR1
where.expression: start_vertex :<>: end_vertex

derived.name: mates_with_substrate
derived.expression: ( EXISTS ( seating_plane_zone ) ) AND ( associated_definition . package_seating_plane :=: seating_plane_zone . interface_plane )

derived.name: terminal_core_material
derived.expression: QUERY ( temp <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'PACKAGE_ARM.MATERIAL_IDENTIFICATION.ITEMS' ) | ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( cla <* USEDIN ( temp , 'CLASSIFICATION_ASSIGNMENT_ARM.' + 'CLASSIFICATION_ASSIGNMENT.' + 'ITEMS' ) | cla . role = 'terminal core material' ) ) = 1 ) )

derived.name: terminal_surface_material
derived.expression: QUERY ( temp <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'PACKAGE_ARM.MATERIAL_IDENTIFICATION.ITEMS' ) | ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( cla <* USEDIN ( temp , 'CLASSIFICATION_ASSIGNMENT_ARM.' + 'CLASSIFICATION_ASSIGNMENT.' + 'ITEMS' ) | cla . role = 'terminal surface material' ) ) = 1 ) )

where.label: WR1
where.expression: NOT ( EXISTS ( seating_plane_zone ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( cz <* external_connection_zone | ( seating_plane_zone . derived_zone = cz ) ) ) = 1 )

where.label: WR2
where.expression: NOT ( EXISTS ( seating_plane_zone ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( cz <* external_connection_zone | ( seating_plane_zone . mating_zone = cz ) ) ) = 1 )

where.label: WR3
where.expression: NOT ( EXISTS ( seating_plane_zone ) ) OR ( ( associated_definition . package_seating_plane :=: seating_plane_zone . interface_plane ) OR ( associated_definition . interface_plane [ 1 ] :=: seating_plane_zone . interface_plane ) )

where.label: WR4
where.expression: NOT ( EXISTS ( seating_plane_zone ) ) OR ( ( seating_plane_intersection = surface_intersection ) OR ( seating_plane_intersection = through_intersection ) )

where.label: WR5
where.expression: NOT ( ( seating_plane_intersection = does_not_intersect ) AND ( EXISTS ( seating_plane_zone ) ) )

where.label: WR6
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( eca <* external_connection_zone | NOT ( eca \ Connection_zone . associated_definition = SELF \ Part_feature . associated_definition ) ) ) = 0

where.label: WR7
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ica <* internal_connection_zone | NOT ( ica \ Connection_zone . associated_definition = SELF \ Part_feature . associated_definition ) ) ) = 0

where.label: WR8
where.expression: NOT ( SIZEOF ( terminal_core_material ) = 1 ) OR 'CONDUCTIVITY_MATERIAL_ASPECTS.' + 'MATERIAL_IDENTIFICATION_WITH_CONDUCTIVITY_CLASSIFICATION' IN TYPEOF ( terminal_core_material [ 1 ] )

where.label: WR9
where.expression: EXISTS ( terminal_core_material )

where.label: WR10
where.expression: 'CONDUCTIVITY_MATERIAL_ASPECTS.' + 'MATERIAL_IDENTIFICATION_WITH_CONDUCTIVITY_CLASSIFICATION' IN TYPEOF ( terminal_surface_material [ 1 ] )

where.label: WR1
where.expression: NOT ( EXISTS ( SELF \ Part_feature . precedent_feature ) )
